mkr.ant.taskdefs
Class Patch

java.lang.Object
  org.copalis.mkr.ant.AntRef<T>
      org.copalis.mkr.ant.AntTask<org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.Patch>
          mkr.ant.taskdefs.Patch

public class Patch
extends AntTask<org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.Patch>

Patches a file by applying a 'diff' file to it; requires "patch" to be on the execution path.

(Doc copied from: org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.Patch)

setRuntimeConfigurableWrapper

public Patch setRuntimeConfigurableWrapper(org.apache.tools.ant.RuntimeConfigurable val)
Sets the wrapper to be used for runtime configuration. This method should be used only by the ProjectHelper and Ant internals. It is public to allow helper plugins to operate on tasks, normal tasks should never use it.

(Doc copied from: org.apache.tools.ant.Task.setRuntimeConfigurableWrapper)
